backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor implementing user registration/login with approval workflow, role-based access control (admin/user), blog post CRUD operations, and user management endpoints including approval/rejection functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three requirements for updating admin credentials from 'admin'/'admin123' to 'admin'/'habibur123' in AdminPanelPage.tsx with security and testing considerations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the H★S Online Earn Platform React application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for H★S Online Earn Platform, robots indexing directive, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/registration.html: Static HTML file for registration route with identical structure to index.html including SEO meta tags and React mounting point.
frontend/public/registration/index.html: Duplicate static HTML file for nested registration route with same SEO configuration and React entry point as other HTML files.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all search engines to index the entire site and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all site URLs including home, registration, blog, task pages, and individual blog posts with priority and change frequency metadata for SEO.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Documentation explaining when and how to update the sitemap.xml file when adding, removing, or modifying blog posts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application file defining AuthContext/AuthProvider for session management, RegistrationForm and LoginForm components with validation, and router configuration for all application pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTa: Displays a table of registered users with status badges (Approved/Pending/Rejected), sorted by status, and provides an approve button for pending users. Includes responsive desktop/mobile views and uses toast notifications for approval actions.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Renders a clickable blog post card displaying title, published date, excerpt, and a 'Read more' link. Formats timestamps from nanoseconds to readable dates.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Provides a daily task interface where users click a button to open random external links, collect secret codes from those links, and submit them via a form. Shows success feedback on submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with responsive background images, Bengali welcome text introducing Md. Habibur Rahman's online earning platform, and a CTA button linking to the registration page.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Promotional card for TimeBucks earning platform with Bengali text, highlighting $1 signup bonus and $2-$5 daily earning potential through games, videos, and surveys.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Step-by-step guide in Bengali explaining how to sign up, verify, complete profile, start tasks, and withdraw payments from TimeBucks platform.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Promotional card for TranscribeMe audio transcription work with Bengali instructions, detailing registration, testing, and payment process with $15-22/hour earning potential.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Welcome section with Bengali text introducing Md. Habibur Rahman and describing the website's purpose to provide free income site tutorials and easy-to-learn tasks.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Mobile slide-out navigation menu with backdrop, escape key handling, and body scroll locking. Includes navigation links, task submenu, and a 'Get Started' CTA button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer displaying copyright, owner info (Md. Habibur Rahman), WhatsApp contact link, quick navigation links, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky site header with logo, desktop navigation (including Work Tasks dropdown menu), mobile menu toggle, and a 'Get Started' button. Uses active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout wrapper component with fixed parallax background, dark overlay, and renders SiteHeader, page content (Outlet), and SiteFooter.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Placeholder component for advertisement spaces with three variants (banner, sidebar, in-content) showing dashed borders and 'Advertisement Space' label.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads and displays Adsterra native banner ads by injecting an external script with proper cleanup and duplicate prevention.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Placeholder card component for affiliate product recommendations with customizable title, description, and 'Learn More' button.
frontend/src/components/registration/Log: Empty file placeholder for login form component.
frontend/src/components/registration/Reg: Empty file placeholder for registration form component.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: SEO component that dynamically updates document title, meta tags (description, Open Graph, Twitter Card), canonical URL, and article-specific tags based on props.
frontend/src/components/tasks/ApprovalGu: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to registration and blocks pending/rejected users from accessing task pages with appropriate status messages.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskHowToC: Displays a numbered 4-step instruction card explaining how to complete tasks: start work, find secret code, paste code, and submit.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: React component that displays a card with a button to open a task URL in a new tab and a form to submit a secret code, showing a success message on submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Custom React hooks for fetching blog posts (all posts, single post by slug, and search) from the backend actor, with fallback to sample posts on error or when actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user management (register, login, get all users, approve user) and authorization checks (isCallerApproved, isCallerAdmin), with query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, neon color palette, fixed parallax background images (desktop and mobile), and overlay effects for text readability.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Exports an array of sample BlogPost objects used as fallback content when the backend is unavailable or empty, including titles, slugs, excerpts, and full content about passive income and digital marketing.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a constant array of help links with labels and Facebook profile URLs for two admins.
frontend/src/lib/registrationConfig.ts: Configuration object containing a Google Form embed URL for the registration page.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Site-wide configuration object for SEO metadata including site name, description, URL, and default image for the H★S Online Earn Platform.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying biography, expertise areas, contact information, and social media links with ad placeholders and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page with hardcoded login authentication (username: 'admin', password: 'habibur123') that displays user management interface including UserListTable component after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Blog listing page that fetches and displays all blog posts in a grid layout with loading states, error handling, and ad placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Individual blog post page that displays full post content with metadata, formatted date, ad placements, and affiliate link placeholders based on slug parameter.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component that renders HeroSection and WelcomeSection components with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentProofPage.tsx: Payment proof gallery page displaying four payment proof images in a grid with an external link button to upload new proofs via Google Forms.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Registration/login page with tabbed interface that redirects authenticated users to home, shows registration and login forms, and displays success message for logged-in users.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Support/contact page displaying two administrator cards (Habibur Rahman and Sumaiya) with Facebook profile links and contact buttons, wrapped in a glass-styled layout with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Task 1 page component that renders task instructions, an interaction card with a shrinkme.click URL, and a back-to-home button, all wrapped in ApprovalGuard and SEO components.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Task 2 page component identical in structure to Task1Page but with a different shrinkme.click URL for the task interaction card.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Task 3 page component identical in structure to Task1Page and Task2Page but with a third unique shrinkme.click URL for the task interaction card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract, persist, and manage URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (using OKLCH color space), container settings, border radius variables, neon/rainbow color palettes, and extended box-shadow utilities for the application's design system.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking architectural decisions, known issues, and feature implementations, currently focused on consolidating authentication logic into App.tsx and documenting visual theme requirements including Bengali text styling and background image handling.
